question: Karnataka government launched "E-Step" scheme in August 2019 to empower student start-ups. What is the name of the implementation agency?
explanation: Karnataka government launched "E-Step" scheme in August 2019 to empower student start-ups. The Department of Information Technology, Bio-Technology and Science & Technology in Karnataka government through Karnataka Innovation and Technology Society (KITS) launched the E-step scheme in August 2019. The main aim is to promote an initiative to empower student start-ups.
